GSD.description:
drm: Lock pointer access in drm_master_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.126 by commit 977d11df793280fe592a68896a8e00b9f813e75c. For more details please see the references link.
